summary: A cynical tragicomedy focusing on the different ways of love in the times of the sexual revolution. Nicholas Mallet, an inconspicuous and shy bank employee, one day successfully invites ... See full summary »
cast: Jean-Louis Trintignant|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Romy Schneider|Jane Birkin|Henri Garcin|Georges Beller|Georges Wilson|Estella Blain|Mary Marquet|Betty Berr|Florinda Bolkan|Dominique Constanza|Jean-François Balmer|Michel Vitold|Rachel Cathoud|Madeleine Damien|Adrienne Servantie|Raoul Curet|Gisèle Casadesus|Georges Bruce|Salvino Di Pietra|Léonie Lousseau|Frédéric Nort|Pierre Gualdi|Gérard Lemaire|Dominique Marcas|Annick Blancheteau|Pippo Merisi|Roger Muni|Carlo Nell|Yves Bureau|Guy Michel|Françoise Burgi|Marie-Christine Carliez|Yvette Delaune|Jacques Verlier|Christine Boisson
title: El trepa
